title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1818/95 of 26 July 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 1573/95 on the detailed rules for the application of Regulation (EEC) No 1418/76 with regard to import duties on rice
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1818/95 of 26 July 1995 amending Regulation  (EC) No 1573/95 on the detailed rules for the application of Regulation (EEC) No 1418/76 with  regard to import duties on rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The first subparagraph of Article 4 (1) of Regulation (EC) No 1573/95  is hereby replaced by the following:
'1.  The import duties for the products referred to in Article 3 shall be calculated every week but  shall be fixed by the Commission every two weeks on a Wednesday and for the period up to the first  Thursday of July 1995 from 1 July of that year, in accordance with the method provided for in  Article 5 and shall apply from the day following their fixing.`

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the  Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 July 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
